tests.prompt: Verify @kirkdiggler/rpg-api-protos includes MonsterTurnResult, MonsterExecutedAction, EncounterResult, HealResult types and EndTurnResponse.monster_turns field

When a monster hits a character, a damage number floats above that character on the battle map
When encounter_result indicates VICTORY, a victory message/toast is shown
